title: Univariate polynomials
content: According to Wikipedia ("Polynomial", 23-Dec-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polynomial ) "A polynomial in one indeterminate is called a _univariate polynomial_, a polynomial in more than one indeterminate is called a multivariate polynomial." In this sense univariate polynomials are defined as multivariate polynomials restricted to one indeterminate/polynomial variable in the following, see ~ ply1bascl2 . According to the definition in Wikipedia "a polynomial can either be zero or can be written as the sum of a finite number of nonzero terms. Each term consists of the product of a number - called the coefficient of the term - and a finite number of indeterminates, raised to nonnegative integer powers.". By this, a _term_ of a univariate polynomial (often also called "polynomial term") is the product of a coefficient (usually a member of the underlying ring) and the variable, raised to a nonnegative integer power. A (univariate) polynomial which has only one term is called (univariate) _monomial_ - therefore, the notions "term" and "monomial" are often used synonymously, see also the definition in [Lang] p. 102. Sometimes, however, a monomial is defined as _power product_, "a product of powers of variables with nonnegative integer exponents", see Wikipedia ("Monomial", 23-Dec-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mononomial ). In [Lang] p. 101, such terms are called "primitive monomials". To avoid any ambiguity, the notion "primitive monomial" is used for such power products ("x^i") in the following, whereas the synonym for "term" ("a_i x^i") will be "scaled monomial".

thm psr1baslem(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(co(cn0, cmap, c1o), crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn)))
} = {
  mprgbir(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), wceq(co(cn0, cmap, c1o), crab(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn))
  rabid2(s0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), cfn), wcel(c1o, cfn), wss(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), c1o))
  eqeltri(c1o, cfn, csn(emptycls))
  df1o2()
  snfi(emptycls)
  fssdm(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn), c1o, cv(s0), cn0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  cnvimass(cv(s0), cn)

  ssfi(c1o, cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), cn))
  diff.co.s(s0, cn0, cmap, c1o)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.c1o.s(s0)
}

thm psr1val(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cps1, c1))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls), cfv(cps1, c1))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cps1, c1), cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cps1, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls), cfv(co(c1o, copws, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  fveq1d(co(c1o, copws, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(c1o, copws, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1o, copws)
  df-psr1(hs0)
  fvex(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cps1, c1), cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls), emptycls, cfv(emptycls, emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  eqcomi(emptycls, cfv(emptycls, emptycls))
  0fv(emptycls)
  fvprc(c1, cps1)
  fveq1d(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  ovprc2(c1, c1o, copws)
  reldmopsr()
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c1o, copws, c1), emptycls))
}

blocks.name: vr1val
blocks.content: The value of the generator of the power series algebra (the ` X ` in ` R [ [ X ] ] ` ). Since all univariate polynomial rings over a fixed base ring ` R ` are isomorphic, we don't bother to pass this in as a parameter; internally we are actually using the empty set as this generator and ` 1o = { (/) } ` is the index set (but for most purposes this choice should not be visible anyway). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:

} = {

  syl5eq(c0, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c1), emptycls), cfv(cv1, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c1, universe, cv1, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c1), emptycls), cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  fveq1d(co(c1o, cmvr, cv(hs0)), emptycls, co(c1o, cmvr, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c1o, cmvr)

  3eqtr4g(c0, cfv(emptycls, emptycls), cfv(cv1, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cv1)
  0fv(emptycls)
  fveq1d(co(c1o, cmvr, c1), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  ovprc2(c1, c1o, cmvr)
  reldmmpt2(hs1, hs0, cmvr, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cv(hs1), cmpt(hs3, crab(hs4, co(cn0, cmap, cv(hs1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs4)), cn), cfn)), cif(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), cmpt(hs5, cv(hs1), cif(nat1, nat0, wceq(cv(hs5), cv(hs2)))))))))
  df-mvr(hs1, hs0, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c1), emptycls))

  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
}

blocks.name: vr1cl2
blocks.content: The variable ` X ` is a member of the power series algebra ` R [ [ X ] ] ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm vr1cl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cv1, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cps1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, c2, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, crg))
  vr1val(c1, c0)
  eleqtrd(cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), c2, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  mvrcl2(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)), co(c1o, cmps, c0), c1o, c0, con0, wcel(c0, crg))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmvr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  id(wcel(c0, crg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(emptycls, c1o))
  0lt1o()
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, crg))
  opsrbas(co(c1o, cmps, c0), c3, c1o, c0, emptycls, wcel(c0, crg))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmps, c0))
  psr1val(c3, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))
  0ss(cxp(c1o, c1o))
}

  opsrbas((1o[mPwSer]c0), c3, c1o, c0, emptycls, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  eqid((1o[mPwSer]c0))

blocks.content: The value of the set of univariate polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1val(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cpl1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cps1, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))), cfv(cpl1, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cpl1, c2), co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c2, universe, cpl1, co(c1, cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))), co(cfv(cps1, cv(hs0)), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12d(cfv(cps1, cv(hs0)), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))

blocks.name: coe1f2
blocks.content: Functionality of univariate power series coefficient vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)

thm coe1f2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, cn0, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, cn0, c3), wf(ccom(c0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0))))), cn0, c3))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, c1), wf(ccom(c0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0))))), cn0, c3), wf(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c3), wf(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  psr1basf(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  ax-mp(wf(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  mapsnf1o3(hs0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0, c1o, emptycls)
  df1o2()
  nn0ex()
  0ex()
  f1of(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))
  fco(c0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), c3, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), cn0)
  feq1d(c2, cn0, c3, ccom(c0, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  coe1fval3(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), c4, c5)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1o)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: coe1fval2
blocks.content: Univariate polynomial coefficient vectors expressed as a function composition. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm coe1fval2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, ccom(c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, ccom(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c5))))
  ply1bascl(c0, c1, c5, c4)
  coe1fval3(s0, c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c5)), c2, c3, cfv(cps1, c5), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c5))
}

  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶(1o √ó { s0 }))

  ply1bascl(c0, c1, c5, c4)
  coe1fval3(s0, c0, (Base `(PwSer1 ` c5)), c2, c3, (PwSer1 ` c5), c5)
  eqid((Base `(PwSer1 ` c5)))
  eqid((PwSer1 ` c5))
}

blocks.name: coe1sfi

blocks.origin:
thm coe1sfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
} = {
  eqbrtrd(c2, cfsupp, c3, ccom(c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  coe1fval2(hs1, c0, c1, c2, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), c4, c5)
  mapsncnv(hs1, hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cn0, c1o, emptycls)
  fsuppco(c0, ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), c3, cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), universe, c1, wcel(c0, c1))
  mplelsfi(c0, c3, co(c1o, cmpl, c5), c1o, c5, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c5)), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c5)))
  ply1bascl2(c0, c1, c5, c4)
  elbasfv(c0, c1, c5, c4, cpl1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf1(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  mp2b(wf1(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)), wf1o(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cn0), wf1o(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  mapsnf1o2(hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cn0, c1o, emptycls)
  df1o2()
  nn0ex()
  0ex()
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  f1ocnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls)), co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cn0)
  f1of1(ccnv(cmpt(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), cfv(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cn0, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c5)
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1o)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1o)
}

  mp2b((`'(hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)‚Ü¶(hs0 ` ‚àÖ)): ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü£(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)), ((hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)‚Ü¶(hs0 ` ‚àÖ)):(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)‚Üî ‚Ñï0), (`'(hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)‚Ü¶(hs0 ` ‚àÖ)): ‚Ñï0 ‚Üî(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)))
  mapsnf1o2(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]1o)‚Ü¶(hs0 ` ‚àÖ)), cn0, c1o, emptycls)

blocks.name: coe1fsupp
blocks.content: The coefficient vector of a univariate polynomial is a finitely supported mapping from the nonnegative integers to the elements of the coefficient class/ring for the polynomial. (Contributed by AV, 3-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm coe1fsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, crab(s0, co(c3, cmap, cn0), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  elrabd(s0, c2, co(c3, cmap, cn0), wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c4), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))
  breq1(cv(s0), c2, cfsupp, c4)
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, co(c3, cmap, cn0)), wf(c2, cn0, c3))
  coe1f(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c3, cmap, cn0)), wf(c2, cn0, c3)), wa(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cn0, universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cn0, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c6)
  nn0ex()
  elmapg(c3, universe, cn0, universe, c2)
  coe1sfi(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmap, cn0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c2, cfsupp, c4)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coe1fsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà { s0 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï0)| s0[finSupp]c4 })
  ‚ä£ c2 =(coe1 ` c0)

  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c6)

} = {
  elrabd(s0, c2, (c3[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï0), c0 ‚àà c1, s0[finSupp]c4, c2[finSupp]c4)
  breq1(s0, c2, cfsupp, c4)

  coe1f(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  mp1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà(c3[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï0)‚Üî(c2 : ‚Ñï0 ‚Üí c3)), (c3 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß ‚Ñï0 ‚àà ùïå))
  pm3.2i(c3 ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñï0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c6)
  nn0ex()
  elmapg(c3, universe, cn0, universe, c2)

blocks.name: mptcoe1fsupp
blocks.content: A mapping involving coefficients of polynomials is finitely supported. (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptcoe1fsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cmpt(s0, cn0, cfv(cfv(cco1, c1), cv(s0))), cfsupp, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mptnn0fsupp(s0, hs1, hs0, cfv(cfv(cco1, c1), cv(s0)), c3, universe, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, universe))

blocks.name: coe1ae0
blocks.content: The coefficient vector of a univariate polynomial is 0 almost everywhere. (Contributed by AV, 19-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm coe1ae0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cco1, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3)))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c3))))
  coe1fsupp(hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  sylbi(wcel(c2, crab(hs0, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c3))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3))))), wa(wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3)))
  elrab(hs0, c2, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c3), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, cfsupp, c3)
  impancom(wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0)), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3), wrex(s0, cn0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3))))), wcel(c3, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, c0g, c5)
  fsuppmapnn0ub(s0, s1, c2, cfv(cbs, c5), c3, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(cbs, c5), cmap, cn0))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c2, cfsupp, c3))
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: vr1cl
blocks.content: The generator of a univariate polynomial algebra is contained in the base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm vr1cl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cv1, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, c2, cfv(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, crg))
  vr1val(c1, c0)
  mvrcl(co(c1o, cmvr, c0), emptycls, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c1o, c0, com, wcel(c0, crg))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c0))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmvr, c0))
  ply1bas(c2, c0, c3, cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1o, com))
  1onn()
  id(wcel(c0, crg))
  a1i(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(emptycls, c1o))
  0lt1o()
}

blocks.name: opsr0
blocks.content: Zero in the ordered power series ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)

thm opsr0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cmps, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(co(c2, copws, c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, cxp(c2, c2)))
} = {
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  opsrbas(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)

}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(0 ` c0)=(0 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c2[mPwSer]c3)

blocks.name: ressply1bas2
blocks.content: The base set of a restricted polynomial algebra consists of power series in the subring which are also polynomials (in the parent ring). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressply1bas2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c4, cress, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(csubrg, c4)))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cps1, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c8))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
} = {
  ressmplbas2(c0, c1, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c4), c1o, c4, c5, c6, co(c1o, cmpl, c5), con0, co(c1o, cmps, c5), w0)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c4))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c5))
  ply1bas(c0, c5, c7, c8)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  psr1bas2(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c5), c8, c5)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmps, c5))
  ply1bas(c2, c4, c3, cfv(cps1, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Poly1 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c4[|`s]c6)

  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c4))

  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c8)

  eqid((1o[mPoly]c4))
  eqid((1o[mPoly]c5))

  a1i(w0, 1o ‚àà On)

  ply1bas(c2, c4, c3, (PwSer1 ` c4))

blocks.name: ressply1bas
blocks.content: A restricted polynomial algebra has the same base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ressply1bas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cpl1, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c3, cress, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(csubrg, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cress, c0))
} = {
  syl(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl6eqss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2), cin(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c4)), cfv(cbs, c2)), w0)
  ressply1bas2(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c4)), cfv(cbs, c2), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, cfv(cps1, c4), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c4)))
  inss2(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c4)), cfv(cbs, c2))
  ressbas2(c0, cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
}

thm ressply1add(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c3), c2), co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c4), c2)))

  1on()
  oveqi(c0, cfv(cvsca, c4), c2, cfv(cvsca, co(c1o, cmpl, c8)))

blocks.name: subrgply1
blocks.content: A subring of the base ring induces a subring of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)

thm subrgply1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cress, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c2, cfv(csubrg, c3), cfv(csubrg, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  subrgmpl(c1o, con0, c0, c1, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c4, co(c1o, cmpl, c4))
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c4))
  ply1bas(c2, c4, c5, cfv(cps1, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c4))
  subrgpropd(hs0, hs1, c3, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wceq(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, c3), c1, c3, cfv(cps1, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))))
  ply1plusg(cfv(cplusg, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c3, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))))
  ply1mulr(cfv(cmulr, c3), co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c3, c1)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)))
}

thm gsumply1subr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))

  a1i(w0, wcel(c2, universe))

  syl12anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c6))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c6))))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, co(c0, cress, c6)), cv(hs0))), w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c6), wcel(cv(hs0), c6))

  impcom(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c6))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cress, c6)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c6))

thm gsumply1subr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)=(c2[gsum]c1))

  syl(c5 ‚àà(SubRing ` c3), (c0[|`s]c6)‚àà Ring, c6 ‚àà(SubRing ` c0))
  subrgply1(c5, c3, c6, c0, c4, c2)

  syl12anc((w0 ‚àß(hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6)))), (hs1[(+ ` c2)]hs0)=(hs1[(+ `(c0[|`s]c6))]hs0), w0, hs1 ‚àà c6, hs0 ‚àà c6)

  impcom(w0, (hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6))), hs1 ‚àà c6)
  adantr(hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6)), hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[|`s]c6)), (w0 ‚Üí hs1 ‚àà c6))

thm psrbaspropd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2))))

} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), co(cfv(cbs, c1), cmap, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn))), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  psrbas(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), co(c0, cmps, c1), c0, c1, universe, wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqid(co(c0, cmps, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), co(cfv(cbs, c1), cmap, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn))), co(cfv(cbs, c2), cmap, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn))), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  psrbas(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), cfv(cbs, c2), crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), co(c0, cmps, c2), c0, c2, universe, wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqid(co(c0, cmps, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  oveq1d(cfv(cbs, c1), cmap, crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cn), cfn)), cfv(cbs, c2), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2))))
  fveq2d(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1), co(c0, cmps, c2), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cmps, c1), co(c0, cmps, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  ovprc1(c0, cmps, c1)
  ovprc1(c0, cmps, c2)
  reldmpsr()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm psrplusgpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  eqtrd(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c1)), cv(hs1))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), co(cv(hs0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c2)), cv(hs1))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), co(cv(hs0), cof(cfv(cplusg, c2)), cv(hs1))), w0)

blocks.name: mplbaspropd
blocks.content: Property deduction for polynomial base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mplbaspropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2)), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c1))), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c2))), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2))))
  psrbaspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c2))))
  breq2d(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c2), w0)
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  mplbas(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)), cfv(c0g, c1), co(c0, cmpl, c1), c0, c1, co(c0, cmps, c1))
  eqid(co(c0, cmpl, c1))
  eqid(co(c0, cmps, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)))
  mplbas(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)), cfv(c0g, c2), co(c0, cmpl, c2), c0, c2, co(c0, cmps, c2))
  eqid(co(c0, cmpl, c2))
  eqid(co(c0, cmps, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c2))))
  fveq2d(cbs, co(c0, cmpl, c1), co(c0, cmpl, c2), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cmpl, c1), co(c0, cmpl, c2), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  ovprc1(c0, cmpl, c1)
  ovprc1(c0, cmpl, c2)
  reldmmpl()
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cmps, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, universe)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm mplbaspropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(Base `(c0[mPoly]c1))=(Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c1)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c2)]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, (Base `(c0[mPoly]c1))=(Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  3eqtr4g((Base `(c0[mPoly]c1)), (Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)), { hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1))| hs0[finSupp](0 ` c1)}, { hs0 ‚àà(Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2))| hs0[finSupp](0 ` c2)}, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1)), (Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2)), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå), hs0[finSupp](0 ` c1), hs0[finSupp](0 ` c2))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1))=(Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2)))
  psrbaspropd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqtr3d((Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (hs0[finSupp](0 ` c1)‚Üî hs0[finSupp](0 ` c2)))
  breq2d(hs0, cfsupp, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2), w0)
  grpidpropd(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  mplbas(hs0, (Base `(c0[mPoly]c1)), (Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1)), (0 ` c1), (c0[mPoly]c1), c0, c1, (c0[mPwSer]c1))
  eqid((c0[mPoly]c1))
  eqid((c0[mPwSer]c1))
  eqid((Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1)))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((Base `(c0[mPoly]c1)))
  mplbas(hs0, (Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)), (Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2)), (0 ` c2), (c0[mPoly]c2), c0, c2, (c0[mPwSer]c2))
  eqid((c0[mPoly]c2))
  eqid((c0[mPwSer]c2))
  eqid((Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2)))
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  eqid((Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)))
  adantl(w0, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, (Base `(c0[mPoly]c1))=(Base `(c0[mPoly]c2)))
  fveq2d(cbs, (c0[mPoly]c1), (c0[mPoly]c2), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqtr4d((c0[mPoly]c1), (c0[mPoly]c2), emptycls, ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovprc1(c0, cmpl, c1)
  ovprc1(c0, cmpl, c2)
  reldmmpl()
  diff.hs0.c((Base `(c0[mPwSer]c1)))
  diff.hs0.c((Base `(c0[mPwSer]c2)))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: ply1opprmul
blocks.content: Reversing multiplication in a ring reverses multiplication in the univariate polynomial ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1opprmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(coppr, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cpl1, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c8))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
} = {
  syl3an(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c5, c1)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0))), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0))))
  id(wcel(c0, crg))
  syl(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c0))))
  ply1bascl(c1, c2, c0, c6)
  psr1bascl(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c0)), c0, cfv(cps1, c0))
  syl(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0))), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c0))))
  ply1bascl(c3, c2, c0, c6)
  psr1bascl(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c0)), c0, cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c0)))
  psropprmul(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)), c3, c4, c5, co(c1o, cmps, c0), c1o, c7, co(c1o, cmps, c7))
  mplmulr(c5, co(c1o, cmps, c0), co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c1o, c0)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmps, c0))
  ply1mulr(c5, co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c6, c0)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c0))
  mplmulr(c4, co(c1o, cmps, c7), co(c1o, cmpl, c7), c1o, c7)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmps, c7))
  ply1mulr(c4, co(c1o, cmpl, c7), c8, c7)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, c0)))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c5]c1))

thm 00ply1bas() {
  |- wceq(emptycls, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, emptycls, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)))
  2false(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls))))
  noel(cv(hs0))
  mto(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cxp(c1o, csn(nat0))), emptycls))
  noel(cfv(cv(hs0), cxp(c1o, csn(nat0))))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cxp(c1o, csn(nat0))), emptycls), wf(cv(hs0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o), emptycls), wcel(cxp(c1o, csn(nat0)), co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  ply1basf(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), emptycls, cfv(cpl1, emptycls), emptycls)
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, emptycls))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)))
  base0()
  mpbir(wcel(cxp(c1o, csn(nat0)), co(cn0, cmap, c1o)), wf(cxp(c1o, csn(nat0)), c1o, cn0))
  fconst6(c1o, nat0, cn0)
  0nn0()
  elmap(cxp(c1o, csn(nat0)), cn0, c1o)
  nn0ex()
  1oex()
  ffvelrn(cv(hs0), co(cn0, cmap, c1o), emptycls, cxp(c1o, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)))
}

blocks.name: ply1basfvi
blocks.content: Protection compatibility of the univariate polynomial base set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1basfvi(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0), cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  fveq2d(cpl1, c0, cfv(cid, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqcomd(c0, cfv(cid, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  fvi(c0, universe)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0))), cfv(cbs, emptycls), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqtr3i(cfv(cbs, emptycls), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), emptycls)
  base0()
  00ply1bas()
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cpl1)
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0)), cfv(cpl1, emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq2d(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cid)
}

  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))

  fvi(c0, universe)
  3eqtr4a(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(cid, c0))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), cfv(cplusg, emptycls), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  3eqtri(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), cfv(cplusg, emptycls), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls)), cres(cof(cfv(cplusg, emptycls)), emptycls))
  ply1plusg(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)), co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls), cfv(cpl1, emptycls), emptycls)
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, emptycls))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, emptycls)))
  3eqtri(cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls)), cres(cof(cfv(cplusg, emptycls)), emptycls), cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)), cres(cof(cfv(cplusg, emptycls)), cxp(emptycls, emptycls)))
  mplplusg(cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls)), co(c1o, cmps, emptycls), co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls), c1o, emptycls)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmpl, emptycls)))
  psrplusg(cfv(cplusg, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)), cfv(cplusg, emptycls), emptycls, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls), c1o, emptycls)
  eqtr2i(emptycls, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)), co(emptycls, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o)))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)), co(emptycls, cmap, co(cn0, cmap, c1o))))
  psrbas(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)), emptycls, co(cn0, cmap, c1o), co(c1o, cmps, emptycls), c1o, emptycls, con0, wtru)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmps, emptycls))
  base0()
  psr1baslem(hs0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmps, emptycls)))

thm ply1baspropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c1)), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), w0)
  mplbaspropd(s0, s1, c1o, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), c0, cfv(cpl1, c0), cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c1)), c1, cfv(cpl1, c1), cfv(cps1, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c1)))
}

  psrsca(c2, (c1[mPwSer]c2), c1, c4, crg, w0)
  opsrsca(c2, c0, (c1[mPwSer]c2), c1, c3, c4, crg, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó `(c1[mPwSer]c2)), (√ó ` c0), w0, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base `(c1[mPwSer]c2))))
  opsrvsca((c1[mPwSer]c2), c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  eqid((c1[mPwSer]c2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[mPwSer]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base `(c1[mPwSer]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c1[mPwSer]c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base `(c1[mPwSer]c2)))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: ply1lmod
blocks.content: Univariate polynomials form a left module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.)

thm ply1lmod(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, clmod))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpl1, c0))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(cps1, c0), clmod), wcel(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), cfv(clss, cfv(cps1, c0))))
  psr1lmod(c0, cfv(cps1, c0))
  syl5eqelr(cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), cfv(clss, cfv(cps1, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), c0, cfv(cpl1, c0), cfv(cps1, c0))
  ply1lss(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)), cfv(cps1, c0), cfv(cpl1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c0)))
  lsslmod(cfv(cps1, c0), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c0)), cfv(clss, cfv(cps1, c0)), c1)
  ply1val(c1, cfv(cps1, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c0))
  eqid(cfv(clss, cfv(cps1, c0)))
}

  psr1lmod(c0, (PwSer1 ` c0))
  syl5eqelr((Base `(1o[mPoly]c0)), (LSubSp `(PwSer1 ` c0)), (Base `(Poly1 ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  ply1bas((Base `(Poly1 ` c0)), c0, (Poly1 ` c0), (PwSer1 ` c0))
  ply1lss(c0, (Base `(Poly1 ` c0)), (PwSer1 ` c0), (Poly1 ` c0))
  eqid((Poly1 ` c0))
  eqid((Base `(Poly1 ` c0)))
  lsslmod((PwSer1 ` c0), (Base `(1o[mPoly]c0)), (LSubSp `(PwSer1 ` c0)), c1)
  ply1val(c1, (PwSer1 ` c0), c0)
  eqid((PwSer1 ` c0))
  eqid((LSubSp `(PwSer1 ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: ply1mpl0
blocks.content: The univariate polynomial ring has the same zero as the corresponding multivariate polynomial ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1mpl0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c3))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c3))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(c0g, c3), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c3), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqtr4i(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3, cfv(cps1, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1), wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  ply1plusg(cfv(cplusg, c3), c1, c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ply1mpl0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(0 ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(1o[mPoly]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(0 ` c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c3))
  mptru((0 ` c3)=(0 ` c1))
  grpidpropd(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, (Base ` c3), wtru)
  eqidd((Base ` c3), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c3)=(Base ` c1))
  eqtr4i((Base ` c3), (Base ` c1), (Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
  ply1bas((Base ` c3), c2, c3, (PwSer1 ` c2))
  eqid((PwSer1 ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, (1o[mPoly]c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (+ ` c3), (+ ` c1), wtru, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  a1i(wtru, (+ ` c3)=(+ ` c1))
  ply1plusg((+ ` c3), c1, c3, c2)
  eqid((+ ` c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: ply10s0
blocks.content: Zero times a univariate polynomial is the zero polynomial ( ~ lmod0vs analog.) (Contributed by AV, 2-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply10s0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(c0g, c5)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvsca, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(c0g, c5), co(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)), c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(c3, c4, c1, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)), cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(c0g, c0, cfv(csca, c5), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c5)))
  ply1sca(c0, crg, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)), c4, c1), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, clmod))
  ply1lmod(c0, c5)
  lmod0vs(c5, c1, c2, cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)), c4, cfv(c0g, c5), cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c5))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ply10s0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3[c4]c1)=(0 ` c5))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Poly1 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(√ó ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c3[c4]c1), (0 ` c5), ((0 `(Scalar ` c5))[c4]c1), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  oveq1d(c3, c4, c1, (0 `(Scalar ` c5)), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syl5eq(c3, (0 `(Scalar ` c5)), (0 ` c0), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  fveq2d(c0g, c0, (Scalar ` c5), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, c0 =(Scalar ` c5))
  ply1sca(c0, crg, c5)
  sylan(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, ((0 `(Scalar ` c5))[c4]c1)=(0 ` c5), c5 ‚àà LMod)
  ply1lmod(c0, c5)
  lmod0vs(c5, c1, c2, (0 `(Scalar ` c5)), c4, (0 ` c5), (Scalar ` c5))
  eqid((Scalar ` c5))
  eqid((0 `(Scalar ` c5)))
  eqid((0 ` c5))
}

blocks.name: ply1mpl1
blocks.content: The univariate polynomial ring has the same one as the corresponding multivariate polynomial ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1mpl1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cur, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cur, c3))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cur, c3))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cur, c3), cfv(cur, c1)))
  rngidpropd(hs0, hs1, c3, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c3), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  eqtr4i(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
  ply1bas(cfv(cbs, c3), c2, c3, cfv(cps1, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cps1, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, c1), wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(cmulr, c1)))
  ply1mulr(cfv(cmulr, c3), c1, c3, c2)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ply1mpl1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 =(1r ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(1o[mPoly]c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(1r ` c3)
} = {
  eqtri(c0, (1r ` c1), (1r ` c3))

  eqidd((Base ` c3), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c3)=(Base ` c1))
  eqtr4i((Base ` c3), (Base ` c1), (Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
  ply1bas((Base ` c3), c2, c3, (PwSer1 ` c2))
  eqid((PwSer1 ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  fveq2i(cbs, c1, (1o[mPoly]c2))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, (√ó ` c3), (√ó ` c1), wtru, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)))
  a1i(wtru, (√ó ` c3)=(√ó ` c1))
  ply1mulr((√ó ` c3), c1, c3, c2)
  eqid((√ó ` c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c3))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

blocks.name: ply1ascl
blocks.content: The univariate polynomial ring inherits the multivariate ring's scalar function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 26-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1ascl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(c0, cfv(cascl, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cpl1, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cascl, c2))
} = {
  eqtri(c0, cfv(cascl, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cascl, c2))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cascl, c2), cfv(cascl, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  asclpropd(hs0, hs1, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), cfv(cbs, c1), universe, wcel(c1, universe))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c2))
  eqid(cfv(csca, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)))
  fveq2d(cbs, c1, cfv(csca, c2), wcel(c1, universe))
  ply1sca(c1, universe, c2)
  fveq2d(cbs, c1, cfv(csca, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  mplsca(c1, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c1o, con0, universe, wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1o, con0))
  1on()
  id(wcel(c1, universe))
  oveqdr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cvsca, c2), cfv(cvsca, co(c1o, cmpl, c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cfv(cvsca, c2), cfv(cvsca, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))))
  ply1vsca(cfv(cvsca, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c2, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c2))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(cfv(cur, c2), cfv(cur, co(c1o, cmpl, c1))))
  ply1mpl1(cfv(cur, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c1), c1, c2)
  eqid(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c2))
  fvexd(cur, c2, wcel(c1, universe))
  fveq2d(cascl, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  eqtr4d(c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  syl5eq(c2, emptycls, cfv(cpl1, c1), wn(wcel(c1, universe)))
  fvprc(c1, cpl1)
  ovprc2(c1, c1o, cmpl)
  reldmmpl()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1o, cmpl, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)

  coeq1d(co(c1, c4, c3), cmpt(hs0, cn0, cxp(c1o, csn(cv(hs0)))), co(c1, cof(c5), c3), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  mpladd(c1, c4, c3, c5, co(c1o, cmpl, c0), c1o, c0, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

  syl6reqr(c2, cfv(c0g, cfv(cid, c0)), cfv(c0g, c0), wcel(c0, crg))

  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(cfv(c0g, cfv(cid, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c4), cfv(cur, c4)), c3), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(cfv(cur, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  ply1lmod(c0, c4)
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cur, c4), cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c4, crg))

thm ply1scln0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))

} = {
  neeqtrd(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3)))
  3impia(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wne(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3)))
  necon3d(c1, c3, cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3)), wceq(c1, c3))
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(c4, c3)), wceq(c1, c3)), wf1(c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wf1(c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  ply1sclf1(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c6), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  ring0cl(c0, c3, c2)
  f1fveq(c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c6), c1, c3)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c4, c3), c5))

  biimpd((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` c1)=(c4 ` c3), c1 = c3)
  syl12anc((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((c4 ` c1)=(c4 ` c3)‚Üî c1 = c3), (c4 : c2 ‚Ü£(Base ` c6)), c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)

thm ply1scl1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  fvi(c0, crg)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(cid, c0)), cfv(cvsca, c4), c3), c3), wcel(c4, clmod), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  ply1lmod(c0, c4)

thm ply1idvr1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cur, c3)))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cv1, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmgp, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c4))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cur, c3), cfv(cfv(cascl, c3), cfv(cur, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  3eqtrrd(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cfv(cascl, c3), cfv(cur, c0)), co(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cvsca, c3), co(nat0, c1, c2)), co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cvsca, c3), co(nat0, c1, c2)), wcel(c0, crg))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cfv(cfv(cascl, c3), cfv(cur, c0)), co(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cvsca, c3), co(nat0, c1, c2))), wcel(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  ringidcl(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  ply1scltm(c0, cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cascl, c3), cfv(cvsca, c3), c1, c2, c3, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cvsca, c3), co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c3)), wcel(c0, crg))
  fveq2d(cur, c0, cfv(csca, c3), wcel(c0, crg))
  ply1sca(c0, crg, c3)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cvsca, c3), co(nat0, c1, c2)), co(nat0, c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cbs, c3)))
  ply1lmod(c0, c3)
  mpan2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  ply1moncl(c0, nat0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c3), c3, c4)
  lmodvs1(c3, co(nat0, c1, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c3)), cfv(cvsca, c3), cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  eqid(cfv(csca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c3)))
  ply1scl1(c0, cfv(cascl, c3), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c3), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cascl, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c3))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí(0[c1]c2)=(1r ` c3))

  syl2anc(c0 ‚àà Ring, ((1r `(Scalar ` c3))[(√ó ` c3)](0[c1]c2))=(0[c1]c2), c3 ‚àà LMod, (0[c1]c2)‚àà(Base ` c3))
  ply1lmod(c0, c3)
  mpan2(c0 ‚àà Ring, (0[c1]c2)‚àà(Base ` c3), 0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)

  ply1moncl(c0, nat0, c1, c2, (Base ` c3), c3, c4)
  lmodvs1(c3, (0[c1]c2), (Base ` c3), (1r `(Scalar ` c3)), (√ó ` c3), (Scalar ` c3))

blocks.name: eqcoe1ply1eq
blocks.content: Two polynomials over the same ring are equal if they have identical coefficients. (Contributed by AV, 7-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ply1coe1eq
blocks.content: Two polynomials over the same ring are equal iff they have identical coefficients. (Contributed by AV, 13-Oct-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1coe1eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wral(s0, cn0, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c5, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cco1, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cco1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c5, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3))
  eqcoe1ply1eq(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, cn0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  fveq1d(c4, cv(s0), c5, wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  adantr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wceq(c4, c5))
  3eqtr4g(c4, c5, cfv(cco1, c1), cfv(cco1, c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(cco1, c1), cfv(cco1, c3)))
  fveq2(c1, c3, cco1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: cply1coe0

thm cply1coe0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  ralrimiva(s0, cn, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cfv(c3, c1)), cv(s0)), c4))
  fvmptd(hs0, cfv(cco1, cfv(c3, c1)), cv(s0), c4, cn0, cif(c1, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)), universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wceq(cfv(cco1, cfv(c3, c1)), cmpt(hs0, cn0, cif(c1, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)))))
  coe1scl(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  iffalsed(c1, c4, wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat0)))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat0)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat0)))
  neneqd(cv(s0), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnne0(cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wn(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), nat0))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), nat0)

blocks.name: gsumsmonply1

blocks.name: gsumply1eq
blocks.content: Two univariate polynomials given as (finitely supported) sum of scaled monomials are equal iff the corresponding coefficients are equal. (Contributed by AV, 21-Nov-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumply1eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cv1, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c9, cfv(cvsca, c4))
  -| wceq(c10, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wcel(c2, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn0, c2), cfsupp, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wcel(c3, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn0, c3), cfsupp, c10))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c2, c9, co(cv(s0), c7, c6))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c3, c9, co(cv(s0), c7, c6))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c10)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(c2, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c10))
  bitrd(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(c2, c3)), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, c1), cv(s0)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, cn0, wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, c1), cv(s0))))), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c4)), wcel(c1, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  eqeltrd(c0, cfv(cbs, c4), co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c2, c9, co(cv(s0), c7, c6)))), w0)
  gsumsmonply1(s0, c4, c2, c9, c7, c6, cfv(cbs, c4), c5, c8, c10, w0)
  eqeltrd(c1, cfv(cbs, c4), co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c3, c9, co(cv(s0), c7, c6)))), w0)
